Product Name: Ah Huat White Coffee Classic 15 x 30g
Long Description:
The classic blend of aromatic white coffee that can never go wrong. A definite choice for all you coffee lovers.

Ah Huat is a Malaysian who was born in 1952, in the year of the Dragon whose ancestors migrated from Anxi County from the Hokkien province of China. Eventually in Malaysia, Ah Huat inherited his fatherkopitiam and mastered the art of coffee making under the tutelage of his dad. His simple, earnest and passionate attitude towards coffee has touched the caffeine loving hearts of all his customers.

FamilyGuard Disinfectant Aerosol can be used across various surfaces such as shoes, clothes, sofas, trash cans, closets, car interiors, kitchen areas, and other closed environments.

Directions

Long Description:
Ambi Pur Room Fresh Gel Fresh Air Refreshing Lemon Gel Fresh 180GX2

Freshens any room with the relaxing fragrance of fresh lemons. 

How to use:
Tear off the plastic film from the bottom section.
To release fragrance, grip the bottom section and pull up the upper portion till you hear a click.
Pull up to increase fragrance intensity, or push down to decrease. Each degree of fragrance is marked by a click.

Warnings:
USE ONLY AS DIRECTED. Keep out of reach of children and pets. IF SWALLOWED, do not induce vomiting; call physician or poison control center immediately. Do not expose product to direct sunlight, near heat or open flame. If eye or skin contact occurs, immediately rinse with plenty of water for 20 minutes. If eye irritation persists, consult a physician.
Short Description:
Ambi Pur Room Fresh Gel Fresh Air Refreshing Lemon Gel Fresh 180GX2

Freshens any room with the relaxing fragrance of fresh lemons. 

How to use:
Tear off the plastic film from the bottom section.
To release fragrance, grip the bottom section and pull up the upper portion till you hear a click.
Pull up to increase fragrance intensity, or push down to decrease. Each degree of fragrance is marked by a click.

Warnings:
USE ONLY AS DIRECTED. Keep out of reach of children and pets. IF SWALLOWED, do not induce vomiting; call physician or poison control center immediately. Do not expose product to direct sunlight, near heat or open flame. If eye or skin contact occurs, immediately rinse with plenty of water for 20 minutes. If eye irritation persists, consult a physician.

Protects fabric colours while cleaning visible and unseen stains that dull them, revealing your clothes' vibrancy so they look as good as new.

TOP Liquid Laundry Detergents are also available in:
- Stain Buster
- Brilliant Clean
- Blooming Pleasures
- Odour Buster

The new TOP Micro-Clean Tech features the Anti Sebum innovation that penetrates deeply into the fibre core to lift out trapped sebum and sweat stains effectively.

Micro-Clean Tech cleans both visible and invisible stains so your laundry is hygienically clean.

TOP Micro-Clean Tech is:-
Anti Sebum - pulls out trapped sweat and body oil
99.9% Anti Mite-Dust - removes 99.9%* of mite-dust

Product Name: Super Roasted Hazelnut 3 in 1 Charcoal Roasted White Coffee 15 Sachets x 36g (540g)
Long Description:
Super Roasted Hazelnut 3 in 1 Charcoal Roasted White Coffee

SUPER White Coffee is for those who love the authentic taste of Ipoh coffee shop white coffee. A Classic White Coffee with addition of sugar and creamer for a deliciously creamy cup of coffee. A SUPER cup of white coffee will bring back memories of the good old days.
SUPER White Coffee exudes the aroma of a light char, reminiscent of the traditional heritage of charcoal roasted beans in the 19th century. Our roasting techniques faithfully capture the rich, smooth, buttery characteristics of this classic brew

Preparation: Hot: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 200 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir and enjoy!
Cold: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 80 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir, add ice cubes and enjoy!

Each pack contains 15 sachets x 36g (540g) Store in a cool, dry place

A cup of SUPER will bring out the best in you!

SUPER White Coffee is for those who love the authentic taste of Ipoh coffee shop white coffee. A Classic White Coffee with addition of sugar and creamer for a deliciously creamy cup of coffee. A SUPER cup of white coffee will bring back memories of the good old days.
SUPER White Coffee exudes the aroma of a light char, reminiscent of the traditional heritage of charcoal roasted beans in the 19th century. Our roasting techniques faithfully capture the rich, smooth, buttery characteristics of this classic brew

Preparation: Hot: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 200 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir and enjoy! 
Cold: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 80 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir, add ice cubes and enjoy!

Each pack contains 15 sachets x 36g (540g) Store in a cool, dry place

A cup of SUPER will bring out the best in you!

Product Name: Ambi Pur Room Fresh Relaxing Lavender Gel Fresh 2pcs x 180g
Long Description:
Ambi Pur Room Fresh Gel Fresh Air Refreshing Gel Relaxing Lavender 180GX2

Freshens any room with the relaxing fragrance of lavenders. 

How to use:
Tear off the plastic film from the bottom section.
To release fragrance, grip the bottom section and pull up the upper portion till you hear a click.
Pull up to increase fragrance intensity, or push down to decrease. Each degree of fragrance is marked by a click.

Warnings:
USE ONLY AS DIRECTED. Keep out of reach of children and pets. IF SWALLOWED, do not induce vomiting; call physician or poison control center immediately. Do not expose product to direct sunlight, near heat or open flame. If eye or skin contact occurs, immediately rinse with plenty of water for 20 minutes. If eye irritation persists, consult a physician.

Product Name: Enfamama A+ Chocolate Maternal & Lactating Formula 900g
Long Description:
Enfamama A+ is scientifically formulated to support the nutritional needs of pregnant and lactating moms.
For Maternal & Lactating Moms

Pregnant and lactating moms have increased nutritional needs to support both mom and developing baby in this crucial period. Your growing baby's brain development begins while he is still a fetus. During the last trimester of pregnancy, his brain grows rapidly together with his physical development.

With proper nutrition and stimulation, you can help support his growth and development, right from the very start.
Enfamama A+ with 360° DHA Plus contains a unique blend of nutrients:100mg DHA - Scientifically formulated to help meet expert recommended daily DHA intake.

High in Folid Acid - Folid Acid is essential for growth and division of cells.
High in Choline - Maternal milk with highest levels of Choline.
Calcium - Calcium aids in the development of strong bones and teeth.
Vitamin D - Vitamin D is necessary for the absorption and utilization of calcium and phosphorus.
Iron - Iron is a factor in red blood cell formation.
Inulin - Prebiotic (inulin) helps increase intestinal bifidobacteria and helps maintain a good intestinal environment.

TOP Super Low Suds for Front Load Machines Powder Detergent with TOP's High Efficiency (HE) Low Suds Formula is specially developed for front load machines to give you an effiicient and effective wash.

Facts on Low Suds:
- Low Suds Detergent are specially formulated to produce less suds and be gentle towards front-load machine's drums.
- More suds does not represent better cleaning power. This is a common misconception.
- Too much suds can actually damage your washing machine's drums.
- Detergents that are non-biodegradable and emits carbon footprint can be harmful to the environment.

TOP Front Load Laundry Detergent is also available in:
- Smart Clean (Low Suds) Liquid

The new TOP Micro-Clean Tech features the Anti Sebum innovation that penetrates deeply into the fibre core to lift out trapped sebum and sweat stains effectively.

Micro-Clean Tech cleans both visible and invisible stains so your laundry is hygienically clean.

TOP Micro-Clean Tech is:-
Anti Sebum - pulls out trapped sweat and body oil
99.9% Anti Mite-Dust - removes 99.9%* of mite-dust
Anti Malodour - prevents malodour
99.9% Anti Bacteria - eliminates 99.9%* of bacteria

Long Description:
NESTLE EVERYDAY Milk Powder

Every day, mothers want to give their children the best. It is a never-ending commitment, one filled with the kind of joy only a mother can give - which is what makes every glass of Everyday milk, a rewarding choice. Packed with important nutrients and vitamins, it allows mothers to give care to their children from the inside - so they get to focus on giving the one other thing that keeps their child going pure, unconditional love.

A glass of Everyday milk contains:

• Protein - for the development of healthy muscle tissue

• Magnesium - to assist in the body's absorption of Calcium

• Calcium - for strong bones and teeth

• Vitamins B1 and B2 - to help the body convert carbohydrate into energy

• Vitamin B12 - to help build red blood cells

The goodness of Everyday isn't just good for children, it's also good for the entire family. So start everyone off with a glass of milk, every day. And see how a little love can go a long way.

Product Name: Ahmad Tea London Peach & Passion Fruit Flavoured Black Tea with Fruit Pieces Foil Tea Bags 20pcs 40g
Long Description:
Peach and passion fruit is one of the great flavour combinations. That’s why we created this Peach and Passion Fruit Flavoured Black Tea. Balancing sweetly exotic fruit flavours with quality black teas, this blend is an essential cup for all tea lovers.

Our Tea Masters create a balanced base using brisk and robust black teas from Africa. We then add real peach and passion fruit pieces, along with our exclusive peach and passion fruit flavouring. This enhances the tea with rounded and sunny fruit flavours. The ripe peach and tropical passion fruit create a brew that’s exquisitely fruity and cleansing, with an uplifting exotic aroma. It’s been a much-loved member of the Ahmad Tea collection for over 20 years, and is our biggest selling black fruit tea in the world!

You’ll find every teabag individually foil-wrapped, ensuring each brew is packed with flavour. The rich fruitiness of this tea means it works well hot or cold. Drink with hot water for a soothing afternoon pick-me-up in winter, or sip as a refreshing iced tea on a sunny afternoon. Just steep with sugar and fruit, then dilute with iced water.

You’ll find every teabag individually foil-wrapped, ensuring each brew is packed with flavour. The rich fruitiness of this tea means it works well hot or cold. Product Name: Vanish Power O2 Crystal White Fabric Stain Remover + Whitener 800g
Long Description: Detergent alone is not enough to remove tough stains.Vanish Powder has oxi powerlift action to remove tough stains which need extra attention while being gentle on clothes, both coloured and whites. It gives amazing stain removal first time every time.Vanish can be used for in wash and for soaking.For tough stains, fully dissolve 1 scoop in 4L of warm water ( max 40 degree celcius) and soak for up to 6 hours for white clothes and 1 hour for coloured clothes.After soaking, wash as per usual.For best results on tough stains, rub before rinsing.
Short Description: Detergent alone is not enough to remove tough stains.Vanish Powder has oxi powerlift action to remove tough stains which need extra attention while being gentle on clothes, both coloured and whites. It gives amazing stain removal first time every time.Vanish can be used for in wash and for soaking.For tough stains, fully dissolve 1 scoop in 4L of warm water ( max 40 degree celcius) and soak for up to 6 hours for white clothes and 1 hour for coloured clothes.After soaking, wash as per usual.For best results on tough stains, rub before rinsing.

Long Description:
Ingredients

Noodle(75.8%) : Wheat Flour(42%), Tapioca Starch(18%), Palm Oil(13%), Wheat Gluten, Salt, Soybean Oil, Acidity Regulator[Potassium Carbonate(E501), Sodium Carbonate(E500), Sodium Phosphate Dibasic(E339), Sodium Polyphosphate(E452), Sodium Pyrophosphate(E450), Citric Acid(E330)], Onion Powder, Thickener[Guar Gum(E412)], Water, Emulsifier[Lecithin(E322)], Green Tea Flavor Oil, Colour[Riboflavin(E101)], Soup(23.3%) : Water, Artificial Chicken Flavor Powder, White Sugar, Soy Sauce, Red Pepper Powder, Soybean Oil, Onion Powder, Garlic Powder, Salt, Tapioca Starch, Yeast Extract Powder, Black Pepper Powder, Curry Powder, Flake(0.9%) : Roast Sesame, Dried Laver

Cooking Guidelines

Hob - From Ambient
1. Put noodle into the 600 ml boiling water for 5 minutes.
2. Please remove the water from noodles (remain 8 spoon of water)and put liquid soup into noodles, stir-fry 30 seconds
3. Put cheese powder and stir well and serve.

Storage

Store in a cool dry place. Avoid direct sunlight.
Best Before: As Shown on Package

Product Name: Super Coffee Regular 3 in 1 Premix Coffee 28 Sticks x 20g (560g)
Long Description:
Super Coffee Regular 3 in 1 Premix Coffee

SUPER Original is our signature blend and has been the staple of our range since the very beginning A deliciously balanced cup of coffee with creamer and sugar Being a pioneer of 3in1 coffee, our mastery is in balancing the right ingredients together to create a harmony of taste, aroma and texture.

Preparation: Hot: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 150 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir and enjoy!

Cold: Pour the stick contents into your cup. Add 70 ml of hot water (80° C). Stir, add ice cubes and enjoy!

Each pack contains 28 sachets x 20g (560g)
Store in a cool, dry place

A cup of SUPER will bring out the best in you!

Drypers Wee Wee Dry fits to your baby neatly. It hugs your baby’s waist comfortably preventing it from slipping. The 5 elastic bands (waistband plus 2 on each side of the legs) give your baby more flexibility to move, crawl, walk, climb or dance.

Flexi-Tape™ makes it easy for you to open and refasten multiple times without the diaper losing its shape. Whether your child is standing up or lying down you can easily adjust the diaper so it fits perfectly.
Drypers Wee Wee Dry is made from breathable material to suit the humid weather. The material provides good air circulation to keep your baby’s skin cool and fresh. We take extra measures by incorporating leak guards that hug your baby’s legs gently to prevent leakages.

Product Name: Clear Men Cool Sport Menthol Anti-Dandruff Shampoo (315ml)
Long Description:
Our day begins with that intense power workout that keep mind focused and body in shape. The harder you push yourself, the more your body will protest. From sweat to grease, from grease to dandruff. Perspiration and humidity from your intense regime could leave you with a greasy and itchy scalp that builds up to dandruff.

Specially made for men, CLEAR Men Cool Sport Menthol Shampoo is infused with Menthol to thoroughly remove all traces of grime, grease and dandruff on your hair and scalp, while providing a cooling sensation that keeps your hair and scalp feeling fresh. Achieve those power lifts without worrying about your scalp.

New Clear Men with Taurine and Triple Anti-Dandruff Technology, consist of Guar BB18, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3) and Amino Acid, to energize scalp's self defence** to remove, resist and prevent dandruff*. End recurring dandruff concern* with CLEAR.

Menthol is known for its cooling properties, it ables to provide cooling sensation that keep your hair and scalp feeling fresh all day.

Long Description:
Fights 7 signs of ageing with a deep penetrating anti-ageing complex for younger looking skin.

Give your skin a more intense anti-aging benefit with higher VitaNiacin concentration in its silky formula.

Helps fight the 7 signs of skin ageing to give you visibly younger looking skin :
• Balances and evens out your skin tone
• Provides nourishing skin moisturization to reduce skin dryness
• Reduces dullness and gives your skin a healthy glow
• Reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
Product Details
How to use : Apply liberally and gently smooth onto your face and neck.

Tips & Advice : Wash your face with a good cleanser before applying skin creams for better results

Warnings : As with all facial skin care products, avoid contact with eyes, If contact occurs, rinse eyes thoroughly with water, If eye and skin irritation develops, discontinue use, Keep out of reach of children

Cyclopentasiloxane, Water, Glycerin, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Niacinamide, Dimethicone, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Butylene Glycol, Panthenol, Propylene Glycol, PEG-10 Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Tocopheryl Acetate, Bis-PEG/PPG-14/14 Dimethicone, Benzyl Alcohol, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Cetyl Ricinoleate, Allantoin, Fragrance, Ethylparaben, Propylparaben, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Disodium EDTA.

Long Description:
Product Description
Features
Removes up to 90% of surface stains

Product Marketing
How do the Flexing Sides work?
Oral-B® 3D White™ has individually flexing sides that adjust to the unique curves and contours of your teeth and gums for an all-around clean and an invigorating whitening experience.

How does the Stain Eraser work?
Oral-B® 3D White™ has a uniquely-shaped Stain Eraser that gently polishes to help whiten your teeth. It works together with the bristles and helps to remove up to 90% of the surface stains on your teeth, including stains in hard-to-reach areas like along the gum line and in between teeth.

Clinical research proves that a new toothbrush can remove up to 30% more plaque than one 3 months old+
+Research with a flat trim toothbrush

Brand Marketing
Oral-B®, #1 Toothbrush Brand Used by Dentist Worldwide.*
*Most used by dentists based on surveys of a representative worldwide sample of dentists' usage carried out for P&G continuously.

Preparation and StoragePreparation and Usage
How to use:
1. Roll the user gently to face one side, place a folded diaper against the user and unfold one side of the diaper
2. Roll the user gently to face the opposite side and unfold the rest of the diaper
3. Roll the user back to face-up position : the diaper should now be underneath the user properly. Fold the lower part of the diaper over the user's waist and fasten the tapes on both sides securely. Be sure to adjust the elastic around the user's legs for maximum fit and comfort Instruction for disposal: - After using a disposable diaper, please dispose of feces in the toilet. Be careful not to drop the diaper into the toilet bowl - Roll soiled diaper towards the front, then secure with adhesive tapes- Dispose used diapers in proper waste containers

Storage
Expiry date: 3 years (Room temperature: 25°C)

Short Description: Gillette Mach3 sensitive blades are suitable for sensitive skin. Mach3 sensitive has high definition spring blades that continuously adapt to the skin, a microfin guard that helps flatten and prepare skin, and an enhanced lubricating strip (vs. Mach3) for great glide.

Long Description:
Oral-B UltraThin Black Tea Gum Care Toothbrush has individually tapered bristles that are infused with essence of black tea, providing a soothing, gentle and deep clean that improves your gum health in 14 days. Unlike most thin toothbrushes in the market, Oral-B UltraThin Black Tea Gum Care has bristles that are individually tapered at the tips, to gently clean between teeth and below the gum line.

Step 1: Start with outer and inner surfaces, and brush at a 45-degree angle in short, half-tooth-wide strokes against the gum line. Make sure you reach your back teeth.

Step 2: Move on to chewing surfaces. Hold the brush flat and brush back and forth along these surfaces.

Step 3: Once you get to the inside surfaces of your front teeth, tilt the brush vertically and use gentle up-and-down strokes with the tip of brush.

Step 4: Be sure to brush your teeth gently along the gum line.

Step 5: Brush your tongue in a back-to-front sweeping motion to remove food particles and help remove odour-causing bacteria to freshen your breath.

Step 1: Start with outer and inner surfaces, and brush at a 45-degree angle in short, half-tooth-wide strokes against the gum line. Make sure you reach your back teeth.

Step 2: Move on to chewing surfaces. Hold the brush flat and brush back and forth along these surfaces.

Step 3: Once you get to the inside surfaces of your front teeth, tilt the brush vertically and use gentle up-and-down strokes with the tip of brush.

Step 4: Be sure to brush your teeth gently along the gum line.

Step 5: Brush your tongue in a back-to-front sweeping motion to remove food particles and help remove odour-causing bacteria to freshen your breath.

Long Description:
Olay Total Effects 7 In 1 Day
Cream Gentle SPF15 50g

• Nourishes for soft & smooth skin

Total Effects fights 7 signs of aging by:
• Fights fine lines and wrinkles

• Moisturises dry and rough skin

Long Description:
Gillette Series Shave Foam Sensitive Skin with 3x protection.

Gillette Series 3x Protection.

- Hydrates hair for easy cutting.

- Rich lather to help protect.

- Lubricants for a smooth glide.

- Lightly fragranced.

Size: 245g

Skin Type: Sensitive

Propellant: Hydrocarbon

KEY FEATURES

• Smooth Gliding Shaving. High grade emollients and lubricating ingredients, enhance razor glide and deliver a smooth, comfortable shave.
• Tips for Sensitive Skin. If you experience razor burn or nicks and cuts when shaving, here are some shaving tips on how to manage your sensitive skin and start enjoying a smoother, more comfortable shave.
• Reducing Razor Bumps. Most common in people with curly hair, razor bumps and ingrown hairs happen when beard hairs grow back into the surface of the skin, resulting in redness, inflammation or bumps that often resemble pimples.
Warnings
Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Intentional misuse by extremely concentrating and inhaling contents can be harmful or fatal.
CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children. Pressurised dispenser. Protect from sunlight and do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C. Do not pierce or burn, even after use.
FLAMMABLE WARNING

Product Name: Pantene Pro-V 3 Minute Miracle Daily Moisture Renewal Conditioner 180ml
Long Description:
Has regular styling and humidity made your hair dry and damaged? No more worries with Pantene 3 Minute Miracle Intense Daily Conditioner-Daily Moisture Renewal moisturizes and helps repair damaged hair, insulate and hydrates every strand to give your hair a healthy, vibrant look and feel, it penetrates into the very core and nourishes your hair.

Pantene 3 Minute Miracle Intense Daily Conditioner- Daily Moisture Renewal with its Pro-V formula penetrates deep, moisturizes, and helps repair damage from root to tip. So you have stronger, shinier hair inside out in just 3 minutes.

Regular use of Pantene 3 Minute Miracle Intense Daily Conditioner-Daily Moisture Renewal brings back the shine and bounce and you feel your hair has a brand new life with it’s natural bounce.

For Dry, Lifeless Hair

From the elements to styling, there are many reasons your hair may be damaged. One sign of damage is dry hair, which can make hair hard to manage and lifeless.

Deep Hydration for Silkly-Smooth Hair

Pantene Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal collection's advance formula features micro-moisturizers that target driest areas of hair and protects its natural lipid layer, for intense, lightweight hydration, leaving it perfectly silky smooth.

Visibily Silkly-Smooth Hair

Using Pantene Daily Moisture Renewal collection shampoo and conditioner together with every wash will help lock in moisture, giving you hair that's perfectly silky smooth.

Product Name: Gillette Blue 3 Sensitive Disposable Razor Pack 4'S
Long Description:
Gillette identified a new lubrastrip material with a lower melting point that allows the lubrastrip to be processed at much lower temperatures, infusing it with much better quality lubricants than before (which would previously not have withstood the high processing temperatures of the standard lubrastrip).

We use a new material to create the strip which can be processed at much lower temperatures than the previous material. This allows the strip to be infused with much better lubricants than before (which previously could not withstand the high processing temperatures in the older strip technology). Long Description:
Regular use of Head & Shoulders anti dandruff products nourish your scalp three surface layers deep to prevent dryness, flakes and itch, associated with dandruff. The Head & Shoulders collection includes clarifying shampoos, volumizing conditioners, and 2-in-1 combos, so you can introduce dandruff treatment to every step of your hair care routine. With a pH-balanced formula brought to you by America's #1 dermatologist recommended brand, you can count on Head & Shoulders to combat seborrheic dermatitis, and other irritable and itchy scalp conditions associated with dandruff. Head & Shoulders products come in a variety of scents and formulas, and include ingredients like almond oil, tea tree oil, lemon extract, and peppermint. The shampoo & conditioner system are safe to use on color treated, curly or textured hair types, compared to a non-conditioning shampoo.

Smooth & Silky Shampoo is color safe** (**shampoo & conditioner system vs. non-conditioning shampoo)

Product Name: Pantene Pro-V Silky Smooth Care Conditioner 335ml
Long Description:
Are you dreaming about having tangle-free, silky and smooth hair? Stop dreaming and start believing because the Pantene Silky Smooth Care Conditioner helps to turn this fantasy into a reality! This hair smoothing conditioner helps to hydrate dry hair to control frizz throughout the day whilst giving you tangle free, silky, and smooth hair.

This product contains Pro-Vitamin Formula with Japanese Rice Oil Essence which helps to:

Give your hair the perfect softness while adjusting the protein levels in your hair
Provide a new and clean look all thanks to the essential nutrients present
Enhance your hair quality to give you long, silky and velvety smooth hair

With rich Pro-Vitamin formula and moisturizing agents to replenish moisture and smooth out-of-control, frizzy hair. Use every day for lustrous hair.

Directions
1. Drain off water from your hair. Gently squeeze your hair to drain off excessive water. This step is vital to prevent dilution of the conditioner.
2. Apply an adequate amount to the tip of your hair.
3. Spread conditioner by combing through your hair with your fingers.
4. Rinse adequately

As children grow up, they naturally want to explore the world. Long Description:
Perfect Baking Mate from Russell Taylors
The Russell Taylors Power Stand Mixer SM-1000 is the ultimate kitchen appliance for baking lovers. A powerful 1000W motor helps you can effortlessly whisk, mix and knead, batter or dough with its planetary mixing motion. This stand mixer is stylish with a sleek black design and also benefits from sturdy rubber feet so whilst it’s mixing the appliance stays firmly on your kitchen top.

High Quality from Russell Taylors
Achieve high quality results from the Russell Taylors Power Stand Mixer SM-1000 as you select the exact speed required for your ingredients. The extra pulse setting allows for intermittent mixing. Our stand mixer comes with 3 attachments that allow you to do a variety of cooking techniques at great ease and convenience. The durable dough hooks make mixing dough and heavier cake mixes easy. The beater is perfect for whisking egg whites, creaming ingredients and for light cake mixtures or batters, whilst ensuring nothing sticks to the bowl.

Detachable Splash Guard
1000W Powerful motor
5.0L Stainless Steel Mixing Bowl
3 Mixing Attachments (Whip wire, dough hook, flat beater)
Sleek design
Anti-skid Rubber Base

Long Description:
Belgian Waffle WM-20
Comfort eating, we’ve all done it. Sometimes, the places we go to tend to ruin our day with uncooked waffles, or condiments that just does not hit your taste buds. As a solution, Russell Taylors Belgium Waffle Maker WM-20 is the way to go, its non-stick, double sided pan will guarantee the batter is cooked. The LED indicator will let users know when to add batter and when its cooked.

Quick and Easy Waffles from Russell Taylors
This Russell Taylors Belgium Waffle Maker WM-20 is great for home use; it fits on the counter without taking up any space. It has an LED indicator to let the users know when is the ideal time to put in the batter and with its non-stick interior, waffles can be removed without leaving any pieces behind.

Non-Stick Ease for Crunchy Goodness
This non-stick interior also makes it easier for it to be cleaned. This dual-sided pan and its non-stick coating will cook the batter evenly. This will guarantee that your waffles are crunchy and golden. It has the familiar grid patterns with the pockets. Furthermore, there will be four easy-to-cut sections, making it easier to cut into smaller pieces.

SIRIM & Suruhanjaya Tenaga Certified
Stainless steel with black trimmings
1200 watts
Easy to use

Long Description:
Power : 1000W
Capacity : 2.8L
1.2mm Non-stick Inner Pot
Cook & Autometic Keep warm Function
Accessories : Steam Basket, Rice Scoop, Measuring Cup

Asians and Our Love for Rice
We are Asians. But more importantly we are Malaysians. And that means good hearty food is a must on daily basis. As Malaysians, most of us cannot neglect rice from our menu as we feel that our meals are incomplete and unsatisfactory without a good plate of steaming rice. The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E2851 will satisfy your dining table needs by helping you to cook up plates and plates of fluffy rice.

Non-Stick Benefits from Elba
The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E2851 will give you plates and plates white, fluffy rice to satisfy your rice cravings. With a capacity of 2.8 litres, you will be able to feed your whole family! You do not have to get your hands dirty to feed your family or spend hours trying to cook the perfectly fluffy bowl of rice. The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E2851 makes it easy to cook perfectly-fluffy rice quickly. It is that simple to cook these days. With the incredible 1.2mm Non-stick Inner Pot, heat is excellently distributed to ensure great level of cooking and non-stick.


Elba’s Modern Method of Cooking
The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E2851 cooks rice efficiently giving you satisfactory bowls of rice to go with your curry and vegetables. With its simple control panel and LED display, cook the modern way with Elba without forgoing the traditional tastes of your family. The rice cooker comes with cook and autometic keep warm function and its inner pot is lightweight making it easy to handle and to clean with little effort. The rice cooker’s companions come in the form of a measuring cup, a rice spoon , and a steam basket to further help you in the kitchen. The very useful and much-needed measuring cup will help you to get the right amount of water to cook to perfection while the spoon comes in handy!

The Sharp EKJ17K 1.7L Jug Kettle fits any kitchen with its modern looking design. It comes with a moderate capacity of 1.7L which makes it perfect for a family of 4 to 5 persons.

The stainless steel heating element in the kettle heats efficiently, so you can enjoy any hot beverages you desired without much waiting. And best of all, it consumes very low power, around 1850W-2200W.

The kettle is equipped with a convenient light indicator to indicate on/off status. Safety is also taken care of with safety lock lid and boil dry protection, and it has gone thorugh a Genuine Strix Safety Control.

Long Description:
Quick and save
A toaster oven can offer many advantages over a full-size oven. Their smaller size allows them to heat up more quickly, taking as little as five minutes to preheat compared to as long as 15 minutes for a conventional oven. Russell Taylors 60L Oven Toaster OT-60 use less energy which could save you some money on your electricity bill. A convection toaster oven reduces cooking time, giving you the potential to save even more energy!

Modern features
The ability to evenly cook a wide variety of foods is the most important element of the best toaster ovens. The adjustable racks allow you to move food closer or further away from the heating elements. Racks that slide out help ensure you won’t burn your hands when removing food from the oven. A removable crumb tray makes clean-up easier.

Controls
The controls on the oven are easy to read and understand, so you won’t have to continually consult the manual. It should be easy to adjust the time and temperature. You should also be able to choose between baking, broiling, and toasting to give you the most options for cooking.

Electric Oven
60 Mins Timer
Ring Bell
Quartz Heating Element
Indicator Light
Adjustable Temperature up to 230 degrees Celsius
Includes 1 Aluminum Baking Tray & 1 Chrome Wire Rack

Long Description:
Multiple speed hand mixer will meet all of your mixing need. Slower start, a zero speed gives you smooth and trouble-free start. All settings are thumb operated, which means the hand mixer is very easy to use.

The hand mixer has rounded shape with easy-to-reach buttons, slanted handle that offers comfortable grip. You will feel more comfortable when doing kitchen work with the hand mixer. The impressive design and flawless construction will save your time cleaning it. You can clean it with a single damp cloth.

The hand mixer is light and portable for your quick task in the kitchen. The hand mixer is perfect for the food preparation on different occasions, like daily cooking at home, birthday party, bakery, and so on.

Efficient Cooling system
220~240V, 50/60Hz

5 speed

Product Name: Russell Taylors Oven Air Fryer 12L AF-50
Long Description:
Air fryers give you all the flavor of deep-fried cooking, without the oil and mess. Get crispy on the outside, tender on the inside perfection every time

Get deep-fried flavor with little to no oil for healthy and tasty versions of your favorites. Air fry, bake and roast multiple meals at once

The Russell Taylors air fryer oven circulates super-hot air around your food so it cooks evenly and locks in moisture — giving you the crispy, golden texture and delicious taste of deep-fried, without the guilt

With little to no preheating time, you can whip up dinner in half the time of a conventional oven, without heating up the whole kitchen. Plus, you can fit both cooking trays at once to make multiple meals in one go

8in1 oven air fryer
Premium screen display
12L capacity

Long Description:
Jug 1.0L with stirrer
Stainless steel blade
Powerful Motor
Double Jug

The jug provided with this set is made out of high quality material to ensure its long lasting use for many years to come. Furthermore, the blades equipped into the jug are sharp and will grind and blend your food goods with ease.


Pensonic Blender with Dry Mill PB-3205 also comes with a safety lock to ensure the jug and mill is locked tightly before you can turn it on. So get yours today!


Stainless Steel Blade

Despite having only 1 speed, this blender is powerful. It comes with a durable stainless steel blade that can crush and cut chunks of food into your desired size and texture of blend.


Easy to clean

The stainless steel blades ensures that you get a clean and precise cut to your food. Be it soft or hard, these sharp blades lasts a long time and doesn't rust easily.


Mill Attachment

In addition to the robust stainless steel blade, the package includes a mill attachment as well. The dry mill can be used to grind flour, sugar, rice, barley, wheat and other dry, non-oily grain. Easy to clean, this mill is robust enough to crush almost any types of food at a fast pace. An ideal tool for crushing both hard and soft ingredients like nuts, herbs and coffee beans. Now blend and blend away with the Pensonic PB-3205.


Note Return of item is strictly not applicable for the following categories: Refrigerator, Washing Machine, Dryer, TV, Air Conditioner, Cooker Hood, Built-in Hob, Water Heater, Ceiling Fan, Ventilating Fan. If there is any defect upon receive, kindly call the manufacturer service center for warranty claim. Usually they will provide on-site service. For Air Conditioner, Cooker Hood, Built-in Hob, Water Heater, Ceiling Fan, please make sure the defect is not due to improper installation. Then call the manufacturer service center for warranty claim. When service center personnel found that it's due to installation problem, warranty claim will be voided.

Criteria for Return/Exchange
You can request for return/exchange within Shopee guarantee period, for more info, please refer to Shopee help centre for more information regarding Shopee guarantee period.
But return/exchange request cannot be made in following cases:
• When request due to change of mind
• When ‘Order Received’ is completed by buyer
• When product is used, destroyed or damaged
• When tag attached to product is removed or package of product is opened and product value is damaged
• When sealed package is opened or packaging materials are lost
• When too much time has passed and product value has depreciated that its re-sale is not possible
• When return/exchange request is made for customised products such as shoes or accessories and undergarment
• When components of product (including free gift) have been used or lost
• When buyer did not follow instructions included in product manual.
The return grace period is 3 calendar days from the date of return request approved. This period is subject to restrictions and exclusions.
Proof of purchase (order number and tax invoice at the minimum) must be provided.
The customer bears the return shipment risk and responsibility until the returned item safely arrives at the designated return address and duly acknowledged and received.
Can I return an item after the return period has expired?
In general, you cannot return any item after the Shopee Guarantee Period.
If the item is covered by a warranty, we advise you to contact the relevant warranty centre or service provider for direct assistance.

You can request for return/exchange within Shopee guarantee period, for more info, please refer to Shopee help centre for more information regarding Shopee guarantee period.
But return/exchange request cannot be made in following cases:
• When request due to change of mind
• When ‘Order Received’ is completed by buyer
• When product is used, destroyed or damaged
• When tag attached to product is removed or package of product is opened and product value is damaged
• When sealed package is opened or packaging materials are lost
• When too much time has passed and product value has depreciated that its re-sale is not possible
• When return/exchange request is made for customised products such as shoes or accessories and undergarment
• When components of product (including free gift) have been used or lost
• When buyer did not follow instructions included in product manual.
The return grace period is 3 calendar days from the date of return request approved. This period is subject to restrictions and exclusions. 
Proof of purchase (order number and tax invoice at the minimum) must be provided.
The customer bears the return shipment risk and responsibility until the returned item safely arrives at the designated return address and duly acknowledged and received.
Can I return an item after the return period has expired?
In general, you cannot return any item after the Shopee Guarantee Period. 
If the item is covered by a warranty, we advise you to contact the relevant warranty centre or service provider for direct assistance.

Product Name: TEFAL Home Chef Smart Pro Multicooker CY625D65 4.8L
Long Description:
Home Chef Smart Pro Multicooker: Perfect meals, perfect taste!

Spend less time in the kitchen and more time with the ones you love! Home Chef Smart Pro Multicooker is the fast, versatile pressure cooker that makes no compromise on flavor. Equipped with Opti-Taste technology and a specially designed spherical pot, its electrical pressure valve works in conjunction with the dedicated cooking programs to pressure-massage the ingredients, enhancing all their natural taste. Featuring 19 pre-set programs, it does it all, from rice and congee to meats, soups and special recipes like sous-vide cooking and abalone. Three additional special functions allow you to adjust the cooking time, pressure and temperature, for still more creative possibilities. There's even a convenient My Recipes program, to easily save three of your favorite recipes for easy access! Offering maximum security thanks to 18 safety features, this convenient multicooker is equipped with automatic keep-warm and pre-set timer functions, both of up to 24 hours. Rounding it all off are a family-friendly capacity and an easy-to-clean design of removable parts and accessories, including a measuring cup, rice spatula, soup spoon and steam basket.

Product Name: Tefal VC1398 Mini Compact Steam Cooker (BPA Free)
Long Description:
The Tefal Minicompact Steam Cooker delivers tasty and nutritious meals with none of the hassle, offering healthy cooking in an ultra-compact format designed for total convenience. The patented stackable storage system frees up space in the cupboard and on the countertop, saving time with 2 bowl multi-tier steaming that lets you cook different ingredients simultaneously—with BPA-free bowls for healthy and delicious results day after day.

Ultra-compact design

A patented, space-saving system featuring stackable bowls on the base, for ultracompact storage and ultimate convenience
Healthy cooking
Enjoy the full benefits of low-fat steam cooking with no added fat—a gentle cooking method that maintains the full vitamins, flavor and nutritional value of your ingredients. Plus all bowls are BPA-free for a total peace of mind
Easy to use
Master your steam cooker in no time with smart features like a 60-minute timer, a heating light, 6 spots in each bowl to cook eggs, an easily viewable water level and unlimited use with the ability to refill water while steaming is in progress
Large capacity
The large capacity 2-bowl multi-tier system uses two steaming bowls at once, saving time while offering generous meals for everyday use

Long Description:
Asians and Our Love for Rice
We are Asians. But more importantly we are Malaysians. And that means good hearty food is a must on daily basis. As Malaysians, most of us cannot neglect rice from our menu as we feel that our meals are incomplete and unsatisfactory without a good plate of steaming rice. The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E1831 will satisfy your dining table needs by helping you to cook up plates and plates of fluffy rice.

Non-Stick Benefits from Elba
The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E1831 will give you plates and plates white, fluffy rice to satisfy your rice cravings. With a capacity of 1.8 litre, you will be able to feed your whole family! You do not have to get your hands dirty to feed your family or spend hours trying to cook the perfectly fluffy bowl of rice. The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E1831 makes it easy to cook perfectly-fluffy rice quickly. It is that simple to cook these days. With the incredible 1.2mm Non-stick Inner Pot, heat is excellently distributed to ensure great level of cooking and non-stick.


Elba’s Modern Method of Cooking
The ELBA Jar Rice Cooker ERC-E1831 cooks rice efficiently giving you satisfactory bowls of rice to go with your curry and vegetables. With its simple control panel and LED display, cook the modern way with Elba without forgoing the traditional tastes of your family. The rice cooker comes with cook and automictic keep warm function and its inner pot is lightweight making it easy to handle and to clean with little effort. The rice cooker’s companions come in the form of a measuring cup, a rice spoon , and a steam basket to further help you in the kitchen. The very useful and much-needed measuring cup will help you to get the right amount of water to cook to perfection while the spoon comes in handy!

Long Description:
Description
Don’t be the kind of person that doesn’t know how to appreciate others. Go now for your hunt for the perfect gift to give for your sister’s wedding. Or your mother’s birthday is just around the corner and hunt the best gifts ever exist. Why don’t you just try to bake the perfect cake for them? Why buy pastries and cakes when you can make one? The Elba Stand Mixer is suitable for you to use as baking appliances and you can even wrap it ad present! With this creative product from Elba, you can make great-tasting pastries with the comfort of your own home.

Sleek and Classy Design
Be it just a mixer, Elba Stainless Steel Stand Bowl Stand Mixer ESMB-9925S looks absolutely classy, with its black frosted finish and stainless steel bowl. To add to how good the power mixer already looks, the Elba adds convenience to its design. Check on your mixture easily without having to struggle with taking the bowl out by simply lifting the mixer head back. The included splash guard that covers the bowl prevents your mixture from splashing out while the mixer is switched on.

For Convenient Baking
Elba Stainless Steel Stand Bowl Stand Mixer ESMB-9925S is made to ease the baking job. The stand mixer allows you to do other things like cleaning up while your batter is mixing in the bowl. The Elba mixer allows you to adjust mixing to 8 different speeds using the smooth dial control knob on the machine so you have total control of the speed of your machine.

About Elba
Elba is a popular home appliance brand in Malaysia reigning under the company Fiamma Holdings Berhad (Fiamma). Despite its humble beginnings and small workforce, the company was big on ideas and growth plans. Within a short time, Fiamma expanded its activities to Kuala Lumpur, where its head office is based today. It gradually established branches, service centres and an extensive network of dealers throughout Peninsular and East Malaysia. Today, Fiamma represents some of the world's major names in electrical appliances, sanitary ware, kitchen cabinets, bathroom fittings and healthcare products.

Eject Button with Safety Device

Long Description:
ELBA provides you with a wide range of household appliances to make mundane activities more convenient. Smart and stylish, highly-functional with low power consumption, ELBA household appliances are matchless time-savers that bring comfort, convenience and pleasure to every household. Give your kitchen a special touch of class and elegance with the ELBA Electric Kettle EK-A5021(SS).

Back to Basic
The ELBA Electric Kettle EK-A5021(SS) comes in a sleek stainless steel finish that is highly durable and safe for boiling water. The energy-efficient kettle has features a unique design that allows for easy pouring. The ELBA Electric Kettle is so easy to use, you can make a hot cup of your favourite drink whenever you like!

Safety First
The ELBA electric kettle is designed with a UK Strix thermostat that automatically cuts power off when the water has boiled, saving electricity and avoiding over-boil. The kettle also has an integrated dry-boil protection that switches your kettle off when it detects the occurrence of boil dry conditions. The concealed heating element in the kettle ensures that your water boils fast and is clean.

Caution
Never switch the kettle on when it is empty. Do not try to add or pour water while the kettle is switched on. Do not immerse the kettle in water. Always put the lid on securely before switching on the kettle to boil. Only fill water up to the full line, otherwise the water may overflow when it boils. Do not touch the stainless steel surface of the kettle when the kettle is on and just after water has finished boiling.

Power: 1850-2200W
5.0L Capacity
UK Strix Thermostat
Cool Base
Stainless Steel

Long Description:
Enfagrow A+ MindPro Step 5 with MFGM Pro, DHA Pro and 2'-FL* Advance is a scientifically formulated milk powder for children aged 6years old and above. Enfagrow A+ MindPro Step 5 contains 40% higher DHA*** that help meets global expert recommended daily DHA intake^ and no added sugar**.
Scientific studies have shown that DHA and MFGM help support 35% fewer sick days1 and 2x benefits of brain cells connections 2-3. With 2'FL*, a type of oligosaccharides. Complemented with FOS# which helps maintain a good intestinal environment. Gut is the largest compartment of the immune system and a well-functioning immune system is crucial for staying healthy.

*2'-Fucosyllactose
*** Compared to previous formulation in 2017.
^ FAO/WHO recommends daily dietary DHA intake of 10-12mg/kg body weight for children 12-24 months or 100-150mg DHA+EPA for children 2-4 years old. Reference: FAO 2010. Fats and fatty acids in human nutrition. Report of an expert consultation. FAO Food and Nutrition Paper no.91. FAO: Rome.
* Sugar refers to sucrose based on Regulation 118 under Malaysia Food Regulation 1985
**Sugar refers to sucrose based on Regulation 118 under Malaysia Food Regulation 1985
1. Veeraman et al (2012). Nutrition 28 (7-8), 749-752. Clinical research shows that regular consumption of formula enriched with MFGM by preschool children is associated with a significant decrease in febrile episodes. With hygiene practice
2. Kuratko CN, et. al. Nutrients, 2013;5 (7):2777-2810.
3. 2.Hussain, G et al. Lipids Health Dis 18.26 (2019)
#Fructo-oligosaccharide

Product Name: Nestle Cerelac Infant Cereal with Milk - Rice & Mixed Vegetables (250g)
Long Description:
‘Eat your vegetables!' is one of those phrases you'll probably be saying throughout your child's early life. Help them develop a taste for health-giving greens and other vegetables by introducing them right at the beginning of the introduction of solid foods stage.

CERELAC® Infant Cereal Rice & Mixed Vegetables is the perfect base to introduce delicious vegetables into your child's diet.

THE GOODNESS OF CERELAC®

IRON – Support your child’s overall development

BIFIDUS BL – Probiotic cultures (Bifidobacterium lactis) CNCM 1-3446 to help improve the beneficial bacteria in the gut, so your child’s digestive system stays healthy.

The CHE Advantage – A Nestle® process that breaks down the cereal into smaller units, thus making them easier to digest.

Packed with 13 vitamins & minerals – High in vitamin A, D, E B12 and C

DID YOU KNOW?
Recommended daily iron intake for a baby 6-11 months based on Recommended Nutrient Intakes (RNI) Malaysia 2017 is 9mg. Each serving of CERELAC® for babies 6-11 months contains 5mg of iron.

Long Description:
Enfamama A+ is scientifically formulated to support the nutritional needs of pregnant and lactating moms.
For Maternal & Lactating Moms? Pregnant and lactating moms have increased nutritional needs to support both mom and developing baby in this crucial period. Your growing baby's brain development begins while he is still a fetus. During the last trimester of pregnancy, his brain grows rapidly together with his physical development.

With proper nutrition and stimulation, you can help support his growth and development, right from the very start.
Enfamama A+ with 360° DHA Plus contains a unique blend of nutrients:100mg DHA - Scientifically formulated to help meet expert recommended daily DHA intake.

High in Folid Acid - Folid Acid is essential for growth and division of cells.
High in Choline - Maternal milk with highest levels of Choline.
Calcium - Calcium aids in the development of strong bones and teeth.
Vitamin D - Vitamin D is necessary for the absorption and utilization of calcium and phosphorus.
Iron - Iron is a factor in red blood cell formation.
Inulin - Prebiotic (inulin) helps increase intestinal bifidobacteria and helps maintain a good intestinal environment.

Johnson's ® Milk + Rice lotion with natural milk and rice to help complete skin nourishment, with up to 24 hours moisturization.

Baby skin loses moisture more quickly than adult skin and still needs gentle care. We have specially designed these products with moisturizers to help keep babies’ skin nourished as they grow.

pH Balanced & Hypoallergenic, tested with pediatricians
Improves baby's skin to be soft, smooth and healthy looking.
With Milk proteins, rice extracts, plus multiple vitamins and minerals

Product Name: Nestlé Cerelac Oats Wheat & Prunes Infant Cereal with Milk 250g
Long Description:
The right nutrition during the early childhood can have an important impact on a child’s growth and learning. That is why it is important to have sufficient amount of certain nutrients such as iron, iodine, vitamin B1 and essential fatty acids in your child’s diet.

Start your child’s journey towards optimum health. This nutrient-dense infant cereal supports your child’s growth and development with essential protein, energy, vitamins and minerals.
Complemented with nutritious home-cooked food, fruits and vegetables, you can be assured that your child gets a strong and adapted nutrient intake with CERELAC. It’s big nutrition for small tummies!
BIFIDUS BL Probiotics

BIFIDUS BL Probiotics help improve the beneficial bacteria in the gut, so your child's digestive system stays healthy!
CHE Advantage

CERELAC uses a NESTLÉ process breaking down the cereal into smaller units, thus making them easier to digest.
More IRON, More Potential

CERELAC is enhanced with 25% more iron than previous formulation to help support your child's body and brain development.
Did you know?

One serving of CERELAC meets more than 50% of your child’s daily required iron intake to help him reach his full potential. Iron supports your child’s body and brain development.

Long Description:
Nestlé Cerelac NutriPuffs Banana & Strawberry Cereal Snacks 50g

Make eating fun for the little ones with CERELAC NUTRIPUFF Banana & Strawberry cereal snack! This easy to pick, specially-designed finger food is just the right size for your child to start a fun self-feeding experience. With natural ingredients such as rice, whole wheat and fruits, it is high in iron, vitamin B1 and good source of zinc to help your child’s growth and development.

Light and puffy, this cereal snack easily melts in the mouth of young children and is also easy to chew. CERELAC NUTRIPUFF is Loved by Little Ones, Chosen by Mums!



Fun-sized finger food that supports motor development
Provides new experience for your child through independent feeding
Made with natural ingredients such as rice, whole wheat & fruits
High in iron, vitamin B1 and good source of zinc to help your child's growth and development
Helps develop hand-eye coordination and chewing skills
Ministry of Health Malaysia recommends 1-2 serving of healthy snacks a day for a child's balanced diet
Suitable for infants 12 months and above
Resealable pack design
Pack Size: 50g
Halal certified

Introducing the all new CERELAC NUTRIBITES Original – a nutritious and delicious biscuit that is developmentally and nutritionally appropriate for Little Ones from 12 months old and above.

The right nutrition during the early childhood can have an important impact on a child’s growth and learning. That is why it is important to have sufficient amount of certain nutrients such as iron, iodine, vitamin B1 and essential fatty acids in your child’s diet.

Start your child’s journey towards optimum health. This nutrient-dense infant cereal supports your child’s growth and development with essential protein, energy, vitamins and minerals.

Complemented with nutritious home-cooked food, fruits and vegetables, you can be assured that your child gets a strong and adapted nutrient intake with CERELAC. It’s big nutrition for small tummies!

BIFIDUS BL Probiotics

BIFIDUS BL Probiotics help improve the beneficial bacteria in the gut, so your child's digestive system stays healthy!

CHE Advantage

CERELAC uses a NESTLÉ process breaking down the cereal into smaller units, thus making them easier to digest.

More IRON, More Potential

CERELAC is enhanced with 25% more iron than previous formulation to help support your child's body and brain development.

Did you know?

One serving of CERELAC meets more than 50% of your child’s daily required iron intake to help him reach his full potential. Iron supports your child’s body and brain development.

Product Name: FISHER PRICE INFANT BABY 1ST BLOCKS REFRESH FFC84
Long Description:
Product Features:

Open a bucket of fun for your wiggle worm with Baby's First Blocks. These chunky, colorful blocks help teach colors and shapes as little ones sort, stack and drop the blocks through the slots in the bucket lid. Empty the bucket to start the fun over again and again! And with an easy-carry handle, you can take Baby's First Blocks wherever you and your tiny to go!

Fine Motor: All that block-grasping and put & take play helps strengthen your baby's hand-eye coordination and dexterity.

Problem Solving: Babies will exercise their problem solving skills as they figure out how to sort & drop the blocks in the correct spots.

Curiosity & Discovery: All the bright colors and fun shapes help to engage your baby's natural sense of curiosity during playtime.


- 10 colorful blocks to sort, stack & drop
- All blocks fit inside bucket for storage
- Easy-carry handle for take-along play
- Introduces baby to colors & shapes

Product Name: Mamypoko Extra Dry Antimos Tape M50 x 4Packs (1Carton)
Long Description:
Introducing MamyPoko Extra Dry Protect – the World’s First ANTIMOS diaper with Lemongrass extract to help repel mosquitoes away.

Using Japan patent technology, it contains Lemongrass extract micro capsules at the diaper’s tape area. It can be activated upon rubbing the tape surface to release a pleasant Lemongrass scent. It is safe for babies with alcohol free, DEET free and no skin contact.
Together with its Powerful Absorbent Core that absorbs and locks in urine up to 12 hours, so baby can have quality sleep with long lasting comfort and dryness.

1) The diaper tape contains Lemongrass extract in microcapsules.

2) To activate it, just rub on the tape to release the scent. If you want a strong scent, you can rub/scratch on it harder. The lemongrass scent is able to help repel mosquitoes.

3) The lemongrass scent is still effective underneath normal cotton clothing.

4) The repelling effect is coming from the fragrance, so the thinner the clothing material, the better the effect.

5) In general, the scent will last for more than the entire average usage duration of the diaper in Malaysia.

6) The average use for M is 5.3 hours, L is 4.7 hours, XL is 4.0 hours in Malaysia.

7) The Antimos diaper tape works similarly like a mosquito repellent patch.

8) The scent helps to repel against mosquitoes.

9) This product does not contact the skin of the baby, and uses Natural Lemongrass extract as scent and is not a regarded pesticide.

10) Unopened package has a shelf life of 3 years, similar to the current Extra Dry range, depending on storage condition.

TAPE M (50pcs) 6-11kg
TAPE L (42pcs) 9-14kg
TAPE XL (36pcs) 12-17kg

Long Description:
Introducing the new S-26 GOLD® PROGRESS®
with ?lipids™, a scientifically advanced formula that supports lifelong learning and helps you nurture the exceptional in your child.

The best time to witness your child’s developmental progress is between the ages of one to three years old, and to enjoy every second of it. From learning how to stand, walk and the next thing you know, talk – your child will surprise you in numerous ways during this stage of rapid growth. As such, this is the time to care for their nutritional health so they can reach their full potential. The nutrition children receive during their early stages in life can significantly affect their growth and development. Therefore, it is vital for them to obtain a balanced diet with essential nutrients that are crucial to support their overall development.

S-26® GOLD® PROGRESS® helps provide a nutritional support with its most scientifically advanced formula that contains ?lipids™, a unique complex ingredient produced using a patented process. ?lipids™ contains sphingomyelin and phospholipids; essential structural building blocks of nerve cells, signaling and myelination. Myelination is a process that enable fast and efficient brain connections.

S-26® GOLD® PROGRESS® contains other key nutrients:

DHA, Choline and Lutein: Higher concurrent intake of DHA, Choline and Lutein are associated with better cognitive performance in school-aged children.2
Lutein:  Lutein is able to filter blue light and may protect the eyes.
Oligofructose: 
- A dietary fibre that help support good intestinal environment.
- Oligofructose is among the most researched and established prebiotics3
?-Lactalbumin, a source of essential amino acids required for overall growth and development.
Sucrose Free

Product Name: Mamypoko Extra Dry Antimos Tape L42 x 4Packs (1Carton)
Long Description:
Introducing MamyPoko Extra Dry Protect – the World’s First ANTIMOS diaper with Lemongrass extract to help repel mosquitoes away.

Using Japan patent technology, it contains Lemongrass extract micro capsules at the diaper’s tape area. It can be activated upon rubbing the tape surface to release a pleasant Lemongrass scent. It is safe for babies with alcohol free, DEET free and no skin contact.
Together with its Powerful Absorbent Core that absorbs and locks in urine up to 12 hours, so baby can have quality sleep with long lasting comfort and dryness.

1) The diaper tape contains Lemongrass extract in microcapsules.

2) To activate it, just rub on the tape to release the scent. If you want a strong scent, you can rub/scratch on it harder. The lemongrass scent is able to help repel mosquitoes.

3) The lemongrass scent is still effective underneath normal cotton clothing.

4) The repelling effect is coming from the fragrance, so the thinner the clothing material, the better the effect.

5) In general, the scent will last for more than the entire average usage duration of the diaper in Malaysia.

6) The average use for M is 5.3 hours, L is 4.7 hours, XL is 4.0 hours in Malaysia.

7) The Antimos diaper tape works similarly like a mosquito repellent patch.

8) The scent helps to repel against mosquitoes.

9) This product does not contact the skin of the baby, and uses Natural Lemongrass extract as scent and is not a regarded pesticide.

10) Unopened package has a shelf life of 3 years, similar to the current Extra Dry range, depending on storage condition.

TAPE M (50pcs) 6-11kg
TAPE L (42pcs) 9-14kg
TAPE XL (36pcs) 12-17kg

Long Description:
NEW Upgraded with NOVAS™ Signature Milk

Nutrient in its native structure is easy to digest. However, overheating during milk production may alter its structure and destroy the nutrient. Friso Gold with new LocNutri™ technology preserves nutrient in it’s native structure.

Give your child the nutrition he needs with Friso Gold for an easy digestion, thus allowing him to be stronger inside.

Over 50 Essential Nutrients to support your little one's growth
Friso® Gold, naturally nourishing your little ones with Easy to Digest nutrients so they can be strong inside to experience more with you.

Keeping it natural, so that it is easy to digest.
Nutrients in their natural state are much easier for delicate tummies to digest. This means your child’s tummy doesn’t get stressed and there is less chance of them getting constipated. Which is important for building a strong digestive system, supporting immunity and providing required energy for development.

NEW Upgraded with NOVAS™ Signature Milk

High quality milk that is sourced directly from our own farms in the Netherlands, crafted by our Holland Dairy Science Expertise. NOVAS™ has a distinct characteristic of naturally small molecules with soft structure*. In combination with our LocNutri™ Technology, natural nutrients are persevered so it is easy to digest for your little ones to be stronger inside.

Keeping it natural, so that it is easy to digest.
Nutrients in their natural state are much easier for delicate tummies to digest. This means your child’s tummy doesn’t get stressed and there is less chance of them getting constipated. Which is important for building a strong digestive system, supporting immunity and providing required energy for development.

Product Name: Enfagrow A+ Mindpro 2FL S4 Original 2.32kg (Expiry Date: 4 May 2022)
Long Description:
Enfagrow A+ MindPro Step 4 with MFGM Pro, DHA Pro and 2'-FL* Advance is a scientifically formulated milk powder for children aged 3- 6years old. Enfagrow A+ MindPro contains 60% higher DHA? that meets global expert recommended daily DHA intake^ and no added sugar**.
Scientific studies have shown that DHA and MFGM help support 35% fewer sick days1 and 2x benefits of brain cells connections 2-3. With 2'FL*, a type of oligosaccharides. Complemented with FOS# which helps maintain a good intestinal environment. Gut is the largest compartment of the immune system and a well-functioning immune system is crucial for staying healthy.

Reference:
*2’-Fucosyllactose
? Compared to previous formulation in 2017.
^ FAO/WHO recommends daily dietary DHA intake of 10-12mg/kg body weight for children 12-24 months or 100-150mg DHA+EPA for children 2-4 years old. Reference: FAO 2010. Fats and fatty acids in human nutrition. Report of an expert consultation. FAO Food and Nutrition Paper no.91. FAO: Rome . * Sugar refers to sucrose based on Regulation 118 under Malaysia Food Regulation 1985
**Sugar refers to sucrose based on Regulation 118 under Malaysia Food Regulation 1985
1. Veeraman et al (2012). Nutrition 28 (7-8), 749-752. Clinical research shows that regular consumption of formula enriched with MFGM by preschool children is associated with a significant decrease in febrile episodes. With hygiene practice
2. Kuratko CN, et. al. Nutrients, 2013;5 (7):2777-2810.
3. 2.Hussain, G et al. Lipids Health Dis 18.26 (2019)

Product Name: Mamypoko Extra Dry Antimos Tape XL36 x 4Packs (1Carton)
Long Description:
Introducing MamyPoko Extra Dry Protect – the World’s First ANTIMOS diaper with Lemongrass extract to help repel mosquitoes away.

Using Japan patent technology, it contains Lemongrass extract micro capsules at the diaper’s tape area. It can be activated upon rubbing the tape surface to release a pleasant Lemongrass scent. It is safe for babies with alcohol free, DEET free and no skin contact.
Together with its Powerful Absorbent Core that absorbs and locks in urine up to 12 hours, so baby can have quality sleep with long lasting comfort and dryness.

1) The diaper tape contains Lemongrass extract in microcapsules.

2) To activate it, just rub on the tape to release the scent. If you want a strong scent, you can rub/scratch on it harder. The lemongrass scent is able to help repel mosquitoes.

3) The lemongrass scent is still effective underneath normal cotton clothing.

4) The repelling effect is coming from the fragrance, so the thinner the clothing material, the better the effect.

5) In general, the scent will last for more than the entire average usage duration of the diaper in Malaysia.

6) The average use for M is 5.3 hours, L is 4.7 hours, XL is 4.0 hours in Malaysia.

7) The Antimos diaper tape works similarly like a mosquito repellent patch.

8) The scent helps to repel against mosquitoes.

9) This product does not contact the skin of the baby, and uses Natural Lemongrass extract as scent and is not a regarded pesticide.

10) Unopened package has a shelf life of 3 years, similar to the current Extra Dry range, depending on storage condition.

TAPE M (50pcs) 6-11kg
TAPE L (42pcs) 9-14kg
TAPE XL (36pcs) 12-17kg

For Children aged 3-6 years

Sustagen is a nutritious milk scientifically formulated by Mead Johnson.

It contains:

Important nutrients found in Food Groups from the Food Pyramid^.
DHA: is found abundantly in the brain.
Fiber (Inulin): helps increase intestinal Bifidobacteria and help maintain a good intestinal environment.

Source of important nutrients:
Protein, calcium, iron and other nutrients and vitamins. Sustagen meets at least 80% of Malaysian Recommended Nutrient Intakes (RNI).

Nutrition that comes with delicious taste!

Give your child Sustagen everyday as a part of balanced diet to help him get 100% Nourishment*.

*with regular meals.

Long Description:
PediaSure® is a nutritional supplement that provides complete, balanced nutrition for children from age 1 to 10 – those special years of rapid growth and mind development. When consumed in proper amounts, PediaSure® is scientifically formulated to provide 100% or more of US Dietary Reference Intakes for proteins and 25 vitamins & minerals that are required for growth and development.2 PediaSure® also contains FOS, probiotics and MCT oil. Formulated with more than 25 essential nutrients, PediaSure® is scientifically formulated to help increase height and weight1 and reduce number of sick days2. It is also Lactose free. PediaSure® also contains nutrients such as Taurine, Choline and Omega 3 & 6 to support mind development.

Usage
With the Sure3 System, PediaSure® Complete provides complete and balanced nutrition for children ages 1 to 10 years old with feeding concerns. Some common examples of children who are hard to feed include:
• Eats very little.
• Very active but eats little
• Accepts only a few types of food.
• Highly selective in food intake
• Eats few fruits and vegetables.
• Refuses to try new foods.
• Disrupts or prolongs mealtimes.
• Poor appetite.

PediaSure® Complete is also suitable for children who:
• need a nutritious snack or supplement.
• are lactose intolerant.
• are recovering or have recovered from medical conditions.

Features:
• New Triple Protein Complex
• 3 protein sources – milk protein concentrate, whey protein concentrate and soy protein isolate provide a scientifically balanced blend of all essential amino acids to support growth and development.
• Advanced Carbohydrate Blend
• Blend of 3 carbohydrates sources to promote maximum digestion and absorption for balance energy release.
• Unique Lipid Profile & Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs) (with AA & DHA)
• Supports nutrients absorption and mind development.
• PediaSure® Complete meets or exceeds 100% of the US Dietary Reference Intakes (DRIs) for protein, 25 essential vitamins and minerals in approximately 1000ml for children aged between 1- 8 years and 1500ml for children aged 9-13 years.
• Contains FOS, a non-digestible dietary fibre that is the preferred food of good bacteria.
• Contains live cultures of Bifidobacterium lactis and Lactobacillus acidophillus which are good bacteria.
• Contains 50% more calories to provide extra energy for growing children. (Calorie Density- 1 kcal per 1 ml)
• Lactose and gluten-free (not for children with galactosemia).

Halal Certification
Abbott Nutrition produces Halal products at various locations under the supervision of the Islamic Food and Nutrition Council of America (IFANCA) or the Islamic Religious Council of Singapore (MUIS) or the Halal Food Council of Europe (HFCE). The following products sold in the Malaysian retail market, are free from Haram and doubtful ingredients, hence Halal and suitable for consumption by Muslims.

This product is certified halal by Jakim. Suppliers’ halal certification for local chicken/beef are from JAKIM/JAIN whilst imported beef/buffalo/lamb/mutton from Islamic bodies recognized by JAKIM in Australia, New Zealand, India
Mind-Q Connect - DHA, GA, MFGM, 15 key nutrients, Fonterra Trusted Goodness - milk from New Zealand, No added sugars, Halal - Malaysia

A child's brain develops rapidly during the first few years of life. Therefore, brain cell connections are important during this period for your child's learning journey. Good nutrition and positive stimulation play a pivotal role in supporting brain cell connections. The better your child's brain cells connect, the faster he learns. In this rapidly evolving world, application plays an important role in your child's learning journey.

Support your child's learning journey - Learn, Connect and Apply. Anmum™ Essential Mind-Q Connect™ scientifically formulated with MFGM GA® (Gangliosides), DHA and absolutely No Added Sugars.

Both FOS and Inulin act as dietary fibres. It is important for your child to have a good intestinal environment for effective absorption of nutrients.
MFGM is milk fat globule membrane that contains GA® (Gangliosides) and Phospholipids.
15 Key Nutrients that support your child's overall growth and development.
DHA is found in the brain.
Suitable for 1 years and above

Product Name: FISHER PRICE INFANT ROCK A STACK
Long Description:
Product Features:

The Fisher-Price Rock-a-Stack toy is classic, colorful fun for your little one! Younger babies will love grasping, holding, shaking and exploring the five colorful rings. The littlest ring has a shiny, reflective surface for baby to discover inside—with colorful, swirling beads that make fun rattle sounds! When they're ready to sit and stack, babies can place the rings on the post, then bat at the wobbly base to make it rock back and forth. Stacking helps them develop hand-eye coordination and introduces them to the concept of relative size as they learn to sort and stack from biggest to smallest!

- 5 colorful rings, perfect for grasping and stacking
- Bat-at rocker base
- Top ring has shiny surface with rattling beads inside
- Introduces babies to relative size and stacking

Inspire kids who love Monster Jam to build their very own monster truck with this LEGO Technic Monster Jam Max-D 42119 building kit. With its pull-back action, boys and girls will be recreating daring stunts from the Monster Jam arena in no time. The 2-in-1 toy truck is packed with powerful features, just like the real thing. Product Name: FISHER PRICE INFANT BUTTERFLY SHAPE SORTER CDC22
Long Description:
Product Features

This fun butterfly friend comes with six colorful shapes for fill-and-spill and sorting fun! Even the youngest baby can remove the top for put-and-take play. As baby grows, fitting blocks through the openings on the shape sorter lid helps her develop important fine motor skills like finger dexterity and eye-hand coordination. And it’s so much fun to dump the blocks out and start all over again. It’s even a fun way to introduce baby to shapes and colors!

- Six colorful shapes that are easy for baby to grasp and sort
- Fitting blocks through the openings and matching block shapes help develop thinking and problem-solving skills – as well as fine motor skills
- Offers fill & spill play for younger babies!
- Introduces baby to shapes and colors

This bonus set of items means you can enjoy the 36 gallon (137 L) pool in your backyard or take the fun on the go. The pool, swim ring, and the beach ball are made from sturdy vinyl that can handle play time and give kids a perfectly comfortable experience on hot days. Product Name: HOT WHEELS CRASH N SCORE FLIPOUT GBF89
Long Description: An awesome way to play with die-cast cars and test motor skills. This unique set is like a game for 1 or 2 players. Each player launches their cars to hit their tiles, flipping them to get all their tiles in one color before their opponent does. Each player can move the launcher to adjust where their car lands, or take a defensive approach and try to land cars on the other player's side to change their tile colors if they are close to the win. For an additional way to play, players can flip up the ramp to launch their car underneath the tiles, flipping them from underneath.
Short Description: An awesome way to play with die-cast cars and test motor skills. This unique set is like a game for 1 or 2 players. Each player launches their cars to hit their tiles, flipping them to get all their tiles in one color before their opponent does. Each player can move the launcher to adjust where their car lands, or take a defensive approach and try to land cars on the other player's side to change their tile colors if they are close to the win. For an additional way to play, players can flip up the ramp to launch their car underneath the tiles, flipping them from underneath.

Product Name: FISHER PRICE NEW BORN SIT N SNUGGLE ACTIVITY BOOK GJD37
Long Description:
Product Features:

The Fisher-Price Sit & Snuggle Activity Book is a page-turning sensory adventure for your baby. This soft book has 5 animal-themed pages, each with its own exciting sensory activity for your baby to discover. The book can stand on its own for babies to play with as they push up during tummy time, and the plush bear friend is perfect for comforting cuddles. With a full page to crinkle and a big mirror to gaze into, plus a peek-a-boo leaf, koala teething toy, and more, this soft activity book and plush toy is the perfect snuggle buddy for your busy little bear.

- Soft activity book with plush bear toy and 5 pages of activities
- Baby can discover something new on every page, including a crinkle panel, mirror, teething toy, peek-a-boo leaf, and soft ribbon tags
- Plush bear is perfect for snuggling at home or while traveling
- Soft pocket for put-and-take play with the koala teether
- For babies ages 3 months & up

Product Name: Hot Wheels Color Shifters Assorted Styles (Assorted)
Long Description:
Hot Wheels Color Shifters Assorted Styles (Assorted)

Now you can transform the color of your Hot Wheels(R) cars with Color Shifters(R) 1:64 scale vehicles! It's simple -- warm water changes your car's color, and icy water changes it back. Some vehicles even feature a multi-color transformation! A wide variety of cool decos and colors offer something special for every car lover. Splash or dunk your Color Shifters(R) vehicle in water and watch your ride transform before your very eyes! It's like having two cars in one -- you can hit the road, race the track and then change color to race again. With 10 different Color Shifters(R) vehicles in each pack it's an instant collection of transformational action and hands-on play. We endeavor to provide accurate information, but this products name, color, and materials are subject to change without notice.

- Transform the color of your Hot Wheels cars with Color Shifters vehicles.
- ?Dunk in warm water to change the color— icy water changes it back!
?- There are 10 1: 64 scale cars in the pack featuring a wide variety with cool decos and colors.
?- Splash or dunk your Color Shifters vehicle in water and watch your ride transform before your eyes!

Long Description:
Experience NERF Ultra blasters -- the ultimate in NERF dart blasting! NERF Ultra blasters have advanced design and performance to deliver extreme distance, accuracy, and speed. They include ground-breaking NERF Ultra darts featuring an innovative flight tip, Aerofin technology, and NERF Ultra foam. Take your game to the next level with NERF Ultra blasters and darts! NERF Ultra blasters work only with NERF Ultra darts.
The NERF Ultra Five blaster features a 4-dart internal clip. Show your dart-firing skills as you pump the priming handle and press the trigger to fire 4 darts in a row. It comes with 4 NERF Ultra darts that are compatible only with NERF Ultra blasters. On-board dart storage for backup firepower (additional darts not included). Eyewear recommended (not included).
